title: 19. The Plummet
content:
IF DACE IS IN PLAY, GO TO 19.1


OTHERWISE, READ:

The Plummet is visible from kilometers away, a perfectly vertical, sheer cliff looming over the Valley. It’s said to be impossible to climb, so the only way to the top is to traverse a series of dangerous trails around the edges, to make an approach along the lip of the Valley from the north, or to zip to the summit on a spiderline.
